thread.title: Gaming Laboratories International (GLI®) Names Raul Bouchot Senior Client Services Representative

author: cnbc.com
title: Gaming Laboratories International (GLI®) Names Raul Bouchot Senior Client Services Representative
text:
LAS VEGAS, Gaming Laboratories International (GLI®) is pleased to announce that it has named veteran gaming executive Raul Bouchot Senior Client Services Representative. In joining GLI's growing Client Service team, Bouchot will play a key role in providing unparalleled and personalized customer service to the company's valued gaming and lottery clients across the country and around the world.
"We are happy to welcome Raul to the Client Services team here at GLI," said Manager of Client Services, Justine Clay. "Raul brings a wealth of gaming industry experience to his new position as Senior Client Services Representative. His expertise will no doubt enhance our ability to deliver world-class customer service to our valued clients."
During his more than 25 years in the gaming industry, Bouchot has held key executive management positions with several major domestic and international gaming companies. His skill set includes a strong emphasis on the Australasia, European, and Latin American gaming sectors. He also brings a broad range of knowledge regarding slots and live and electronic table games.
Bouchot recently completed a consultancy as VP of Business Development with Vancouver, B.C.-based Jackpot Digital. He assisted Jackpot Digital's senior management in developing a new company culture as part of the purchase by Jackpot Digital of electronic table game manufacturer Pokertek, Inc., where Bouchot had served as Sr. VP of Business Development.
Previously, Bouchot served as Business Development Manager for International Game Technology's Multi-Player Series and Digi Deal product lines. He also was the Executive VP and COO of TCS America, Inc. (dba TCSJOHNHUXLEY), where he was responsible for bottom-line operational management encompassing all aspects of manufacturing, sales, and finance. Bouchot also held several key management positions at Shuffle Master Gaming, including VP of International Sales, Director of Sales, and Regional Sales Manager. He began his professional career at Tripp Plastics in Reno, Nevada, where he established the company's casino sales division.
About Gaming Laboratories International
Gaming Laboratories International, LLC delivers the highest quality land-based, lottery and iGaming testing and assessment services. GLI's laboratory locations are found on six continents, and the company holds U.S. and international accreditations for compliance with ISO/IEC 17025, 17020, and 17065 standards for technical competence in the gaming, wagering and lottery industries. GLI also holds ISTBQ certification. For more information, visit gaminglabs.com.
